Traditional in Unicode standard 繁体字的Unicode标准:U+95CA

Older traditional characters 旧繁体字/异体字: 濶䦚

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:阔

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+9614

Main pronunciation 主要发音: kuò

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning estranged, wide.

English senses 英语理解: broad, ample, wide; be apart

Usage example 用法举例: 開闊 kāi kuò (expand)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1847

Shuowen 说文解字:

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 闊 mutant 濶䦚 from gate (门)門 mén and phonetic alive 活𣴠 huó and (rem- 氵 shuǐ)(rem- 舌 shé) C334 闊<濶> simp 阔.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
Wide open door.

Simplification rule :

Simplification rule explained :

Variant rule : C334 闊<濶>

Variant rule clarification :
闊 (estranged, to be apart, wide) TW 濶 <to be apart, wide>

Applied rules : A077 门門

濶字的基本解释

濶
kuò
见“阔”。

濶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuò］
［《廣韻》苦括切，入末，溪。］
亦作“濶1”。“阔1”的繁体字。
(1)疏远；背离。
(2)迂阔；不切实际。
(3)隔绝；断绝。
(4)阔别；久别。
(5)稀少；缺乏。
(6)宽广；阔大。
(7)宽缓；宽简。
(8)形容胸襟开阔，才思广博。
(9)豪奢，荣显。
(10)长度。
(11)借指圆径长度。

Zhu

Zhu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuò]
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, enter the end, stream. ]
Also known as "Zhu 1". Traditional characters of "广1".
(1) Alienation; deviation.
(2) Roundabout; unrealistic.
(3) Isolate; cut off.
(4) A farewell; a long farewell.
(5) Scarce; lack.
(6) Broad; wide.
(7) Tolerance; Tolerance and simplicity.
(8) Describes broad-minded and broad-minded.
(9) Extravagance and glory.
(10) Length.
(11) Borrowing refers to the length of the circle diameter.
